title: Messed Up
description:
Richard Munchkin, Christine Collier, and Oz du Soleil share stories about peeing in the shower, saying "fuck you" to shame, and surviving homelessness.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Richard Munchkin, Christine Collier, Talking Heads, Beastie Boys, kevin Allison, Oz du Soleil, The Isley Brothers)
